feed.title: Halfday Works - Brand Consultancy and Design Services
feed.subtitle: Halfday Works is an independent brand consultancy and design services firm based in Pune, India.

entry.title: Blessed Bites
entry.content:
Blessed Bites is a startup restaurant run by a lovely couple with much gratitude for life and immense pride for India in their hearts. They wanted to represent these notions in their restaurant identity and wanted something that could stick and stay long as a brand.

Our initial discussion with them led us to understand where they came up with their original name and identity 'Rollers and Toasters' which was very literal in describing the food they served and the fun take on roller coasters was, we thought, an unnecessary element that led to confusion amongst customers.

"Blessed Bites. Made Fresh."

We had a great time coming up with the name 'Blessed Bites' and the tagline 'Made Fresh' in this rebranding exercise. It fit seemlessly with the owners' ethos. We used the tricolour saffron and green colours in the logo that represented their love for the nation.

A clean menu card was designed using the branding to make it even more purposeful. The couple insisted on having their own identities also be incorporated in the design and so their sketches were created and added to the menu.

"Clean lines. Clear products."

Environmental graphics were also created utilising branding to give the restaurant a clean and hygenic look and feel. The photographs used in the designs are of very high resolution giving crisp prints that display the products clearly.
entry.summary: Blessed Bites is a startup restaurant run by a lovely couple with much gratitude for life and immense pride for India in their hearts. They wanted to represent these notions in their restaurant identity and wanted something that could stick and stay long as a brand.

entry.title: Swaroopa Sales
entry.content:
Swaroopa Sales sells architectural metal rails, grills and decorative designs. It also sells fittings and fixtures. In short, they provide accurately engineered products and artistically designed decor items all under the same roof.

And we had to showcase both these sides in their new brand identity with a prickly rose plant shaped like 'S' in the background and bold sharp black cut circles that form 'S' containing the red surrounding the rose.

"Red and Black. Artistic and Accurate."

We also created a business card for them that stood out from the rest and gained instant recognition. Also we created a banner design in the local language using devnagri fonts for use when required.

"Instant Recognition. Everywhere."

*Note: The phone number in the image above is deliberately hidden.
entry.summary: Swaroopa Sales sells architectural metal rails, grills and decorative designs. It also sells fittings and fixtures. In short, they provide accurately engineered products and artistically designed decor items all under the same roof.

entry.title: Shirkuâ€™s Adventures
entry.content:
Shirku is a young budding magician travelling to the great magician's island to become a master magician. But something has gone horribly wrong on the island. And he wants to find out what. This is the premis of the game and we created the character based on this.

"Lovable and distinctive. Shirku's great."

The character is a young child in his sleeping pyjamas that are designed like a magician's robe along with his star studded magician's hat. He is in his favourite boots. And has his powerful beginner's magic wand. There are only 6 moving parts in total which reduces the animator's load.

The face is gently smiling and can move from the neck to see upwards and downwards. There are only 3 expressions which are animated to conditions in gameplay.

Background concepts for different levels namely, Beach - Jungle - Spooky, have been designed for colour schemes and continuous scroll. These concepts will be further modified and developed as gameplay design progresses. Also sequence designs and block designs are under way and will be finished side by side with game code and play sequences.

"Beach - Jungle - Spooky"
entry.summary: Shirku is a young budding magician travelling to the great magician's island to become a master magician. But something has gone horribly wrong on the island. And he wants to find out what. This is the premis of the game and we created the character based on this.

entry.title: Shree Krishna Dairy and Sweets
entry.content:
Shree Krishna Dairy and Sweets is a famous name in its city. It is a premier dairy and traditional Indian sweets producer serving locals since 1999. It aspires to become a brand now and is preparing itself for a larger market. And so, they wanted to update their identity to recent times and wanted a logo that makes them unique and recognisable, that is proud of its heritage and keep to its roots.

"English and Devnagari."

We designed a logo with both english and marathi languages that aligned with the state regulations and also helped in marketing focusing on local population which is largely marathi-speaking.

With their aim to become a brand, they wanted to explore packaging designs for their dairy products that stood out in a highly competetive business. Along with it, updating their sweet box designs became a necessity.

"Fresh. Clean. Distintive."
entry.summary: Shree Krishna Dairy and Sweets is a famous name in its city. It is a premier dairy and traditional Indian sweets producer serving locals since 1999. It aspires to become a brand now and is preparing itself for a larger market. And so, they wanted to update their identity to recent times and wanted a logo that makes them unique and recognisable, that is proud of its heritage and keep to its roots.

entry.title: Kaustubh Mart
entry.content:
Kaustubh Mart was a perfect assignment for us since it had to be started from scratch. While the entreprenuer client had a few guidelines for us, we were given the liberty to be our creative self. Initially, the new venture was to be named Kaustubh Super Bazaar - with "Kaustubh" being the name of one of their family members. But after surveys and discussions, it was finalised to be Kaustubh Mart.

We wanted to respect their feelings behind the name. So we took the liberty to research into the name and found out its mythological significance.

"Mystic. Lotus Inspired."

Kaustubh is the name given to a ratna (gem) that emerged from the mythological tale of Samudramanthan which is adorned by Lord Vishnu. Even so, there is no description of this ratna and since it emerged from the eternal sea, some intellectuals depict it as the lotus that Vishnu always holds in his hand and so we took this as an opportunity to make the logo lotus inspired. Coincedentally, K also stands for Kamal - which literally means lotus in Sanskrit.
entry.summary: Kaustubh Mart was a perfect assignment for us since it had to be started from scratch. While the entreprenuer client had a few guidelines for us, we were given the liberty to be our creative self. Initially, the new venture was to be named Kaustubh Super Bazaar - with "Kaustubh" being the name of one of their family members. But after surveys and discussions, it was finalised to be Kaustubh Mart.

entry.title: Cafe Coffee Hutt
entry.content:
Cafe Coffee Hutt is an up and coming local favorite coffee house and fastfood joint. They recently moved to a larger location with better infrastructure and more seating capacity. This new space is designed to be a perfect hangout place for both young and old.

But this perfect spot is located on a street out of the market and with lesser footfall. As a resultant, they realised a drop in their walk-ins while their online and delivery orders had remained stable.The plush comfortable place needed a playful inviting buzz.

"Playful. Inviting. Comfortable."

The brief was simplified to these three words. Graphic designs for inhouse uses such as placemats, coasters and environmental posters were created.

"The Hot Burger - This Winter Offer"

We created a copy "The Hot Burger - This Winter Offer" for their ongoing offers and aligned them with the brief. This copy also attempts to resolve the question of stone cold food deliveries during the winter season. It invites customers to relish on hot food while enjoying the cozy and comfortable space the campaign promotes.

Coupons to be given with devilery orders, hoardings around the corners of the street showing offers and directions, online content for social media and newspaper inserts were designed to reach maximum people around the new place.
entry.summary: Cafe Coffee Hutt is an up and coming local favorite coffee house and fastfood joint. They recently moved to a larger location with better infrastructure and more seating capacity. This new space is designed to be a perfect hangout place for both young and old.
